metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6072 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in Jenkins before 1.491, Jenkins LTS before 1.480.1, and Jenkins Enterprise 1.424.x before 1.424.6.13, 1.447.x before 1.447.4.1, and 1.466.x before 1.466.10.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6072` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjenkins-winstone-java - 0.8.10-jenkins-47+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jenkins-winstone package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.10-jenkins-47+dfsg-1').
